Title: Money Trap
Writer: Graham Yost (developed for television by), Chris Provenzano (teleplay), Elmore Leonard (story), Chris Provenzano (story), Elmore Leonard (based on the short story 'Fire in the Hole' by), Ingrid Escajeda (executive story editor), VJ Boyd (story)
Actors: Timothy Olyphant, Nick Searcy, Joelle Carter, Jacob Pitts
Plot: While Raylan has to track down a fugitive for a second time, Boyd and Ava go to an exclusive party hoping to track down Drew Thompson.
